content:
Hi,

I'm using DefaultProfileValidationSupport and FHIRInstancevalidator for profile validation. I found that the HAPI validation library does not validate LOINC codes. I'm using 4.1.0 version of HAPI libraries. It is not working for DSTU2, STU3, R4 versions.
Please advise on how to validate these codes. Let me know if this feature is not supported yet.

Regards,
Mukesh
